title: About
text: I created this website as a personal project. A place to upload all the of oceanographic work that I’ve been doing - while also testing some coding skills I’ve been working on. Over the course of 2025, I hope to develop this into a full portfolio of my Masters research on fluctuating ocean temperatures and extreme events.

title: The Ocean Statistics Website
text:
The centralized site for oceanographic and statistical content curated by MSc student Jesse Phillips. The connected pages contain past and current projects, blog posts and tutorials.
UPDATE: This website is currently a work in progress [24/04/2025].


Here is where I will upload past and current research on oceanographic and statistical topics.



Interesting things I come across that I would like to speak on.



Instructional pieces on how to accomplish various tasks I’ve come across, will probably include some or other coding.

title: Projects
text:

Changes in SST ranges and extreme event frequency along the Southern African coastline
Statistically defining extreme thermal fluctuations in the ocean
